name: Any Data must be declared, use IMPLICIT NONE in Subroutines  (FORTRAN)
description: The artifact is researched for the presence of the IMPLICIT NONE statement. If an artifact does not have this statement embedded, the artifact is considered being in violation.
rationale: Every artifact must have an IMPLICIT NONE statement to make sure the compiler does not automatically declare undeclared variables as integer.
remediation: Verify existing variables for proper type declaration and add the IMPLICIT NONE statement.
